Set the QEMU Guest Agent options.

JSON Example:

```json

	"qemu_guest_agent": {
			  "enabled": true,
			  "type": "isa",
			  "freeze": false,
			  "fstrim": false
	}

```
HCL2 example:

```hcl

	qemu_guest_agent {
	  enabled = true
	  type = "isa"
	  freeze = false
	  fstrim = false
	}

```
